name: User Register Date
author: JJMontalban

sections.description:
Add the registration date of each user in WordPress both in the user list and on the user profile page in the admin panel. This provides a quick and convenient way to see when users registered on your site.

How to Install

  1. Upload the user-register-date folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GNU General Public License version 3 or later.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the user-register-date folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How can I change the format of the registration date?

You can change the format of the date and other date-related settings on the WordPress settings page.

short_description: Displays the registration date of users in WordPress on the user profile page and in the user list in the admin panel.
